scenario.name: user_registr
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0 Expires: 3600 Max-Forwards: 70

REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [field3] Content-Length: 0 Expires: 3600 Max-Forwards: 70
